item.title: UT-201 West - Exits 14 and 13
item.description: UT-201 west at Exit 14 - 3200 West. Approaching Exit 13 - UT-154/Bangerter Highway.

item.title: UT-154 North Approaching UT-201
item.description: UT-154 North (Bangerter Highway) approaching UT-201 in West Valley City.

item.title: UT-154 North Approaching UT-201
item.description: UT-154 North (Bangerter Highway) approaching UT-201. Use UT-201 west for Magna; UT-201 east for Salt Lake City. Continue north on UT-154 for the Salt Lake City International Airport.

item.title: UT-154 North at UT-171 West
item.description: UT-154 North (Bangerter Highway) at UT-171 West/3500 South in West Valley City.

item.title: UT-154 North at UT-173 East (5400 South)
item.description: UT-154 North (Bangerter Highway) at UT-173 East (5400 South) in Taylorsville. The font size on the Utah highway shields is larger than normal.

item.title: UT-154 North - Exit 13
item.description: UT-154 North (Bangerter Highway) at Exit 13 - UT-48/7800 South.

item.title: UT-154 North - Salt Lake City Area Airports
item.description: Salt Lake City Area airport directions on UT-154 North (Bangerter Highway). Use next exit (Exit 13) for South Valley Regional Airport. Continue north on UT-154 for the Salt Lake City International Airport.

item.title: UT-154 North at UT-71 (12600 South)
item.description: UT-154 North (Bangerter Highway) at UT-71 East (12600 South) in Riverton.

item.title: UT-154 North Approaching UT-71 East (12600 South)
item.description: UT-154 North Approaching UT-71 East (12600 South). Turn right for UT-71 East; left for 12600 South to Herriman.

item.title: UT-154 North Approaching West 13400 South
item.description: UT-154 North (Bangerter Highway) approaching West 13400 South.
